title: Launch button doesn't work no matter what i do.
body:
Ever since about a few days ago my league client has been a little shoddy, and forcing me to restart my computer before i can even get the launch button to do something. I've tried multiple way of fixing this problem but none of them seem to work rather it be uninstalling the game (the correct way) multiple times over, or trying to repair my client (which when i click repair actually nothing happens, just takes me back to the broken launch button. I have noticed that the discord app on my computer hasn't been working at all either for the exact amount of time that my league client started bugging. Just wanted to see if someone could help me because none of my friends understand why this is happening.

-plshelpimtryinagrind.

replies.body:
Since both League and Discord rely on a stable connection to their respective servers to operate, I suspect your issue is caused by a *poor connection*. I'd like you to work through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common causes for this issue.

Let me know if this caused a change.

I have a stable connection. I am wired and have never had any connection issues. The connection isn't the problem but sometimes when I reinstall league every time it breaks again (and discord as well) they start working.
If you've worked through *all* the steps in that guide are still have issues, we can move forward with troubleshooting, but I'll need a confirmation from you. ^.^
Yeah I really want to get this problem fixed so if you could help me as soon as possible that would be nice.

We'll be able to troubleshoot this further if you grab some [**system logs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our tech specialists will take a look at your logs and be able to help pinpoint the cause much quicker than we can here on H&S.

Let me know if you run into issues.
Forgot to say that restarting my computer before playing league or using discord is really annoying
